mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (sns_type,sns_id,email,nickname,profile,role, deleted_at, created_id,created_at,updated_id, updated_at) VALUES (#{snsType}, #{snsId}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{profile}, #{role}, #{deletedAt}, #{createdId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedId}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM members WHERE sns_id = #{snsId} AND sns_type = #{snsType};
SELECT * FROM members WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT(#{nickname}, '%') LIMIT 3

SELECT #{memberId} AS member_id, #{currentMemberId} AS current_member_id, m.profile AS image_url, m.nickname, (f.id IS NOT NULL) AS is_following, NULL AS self_introduction, NULL AS interests FROM members m LEFT JOIN follow f ON f.followee_id = m.id AND f.follower_id = #{currentMemberId} WHERE m.id = #{memberId};
